articles.title: Embiid ejected after drawing 2 technicals in game against Wembanyama and Spurs - The Associated Press
articles.description: Philadelphia 76ers star Joel Embiid was ejected in the first half of Monday night’s game against San Antonio after drawing two technical fouls. Referee Jenna Schroeder ejected Embiid with 2 minutes, 59 seconds left in the second quarter. The seven-time All-St…
articles.content:
PHILADELPHIA (AP) Philadelphia 76ers star Joel Embiid was ejected in the first half of Monday nights 111-106 victory over the San Antonio Spurs after drawing two technical fouls

articles.author: University of Michigan
articles.title: Twisted Edison: Filaments curling at the nanoscale produce light waves that twirl as they travel - Phys.org
articles.description: Bright, twisted light can be produced with technology similar to an Edison light bulb, researchers at the University of Michigan have shown. The finding adds nuance to fundamental physics while offering a new avenue for robotic vision systems and other applic…
